thread.title: Multi-talented Ross Love does it all, from all over, for Indian Valley
thread.title_full: Multi-talented Ross Love does it all, from all over, for Indian Valley

author: Jim Thomas
title: Multi-talented Ross Love does it all, from all over, for Indian Valley
text: CantonRep.com sports writer Posted Oct. 21, 2015 at 1:04 PM He lines up on the flank. In the backfield. Under center. Way back off the line of scrimmage at times. He catches it, runs it, throws it and kicks it, too. Ross Love is simply doing it all for the Indian Valley Braves this year. “We don’t let him off the field,” laughed Indian Valley head coach Matt Lancaster.
